variants.Description in input context: This variant was found in the UNC13A gene.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the SK-N-SH cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: The expression level of the variant NM_001287564.3:c.927T>C was significantly increased.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Expression level less than or equal to the mean + 2SD of wild-type samples.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Expression level greater than the mean + 2SD of wild-type samples.
